# Spec Design Document Template

Use this template to design new features. Complete all required sections.

## Overview
- Problem statement
- Goals / Non-goals
- Assumptions

## Architecture
- High-level diagram (Mermaid encouraged)
- Data flow and boundaries

## Components and Interfaces
- Modules/services and responsibilities
- Public APIs, CLI, MCP tools or endpoints

## Data Models
- Schemas, types, and validations
- Persistence or caching needs

## Error Handling
- Failure modes
- Retries, timeouts, fallbacks

## Testing Strategy
- Unit, integration, end-to-end
- Test data and fixtures

## Security Considerations
- Secrets, authn/z, data protection
- Dependency and supply-chain concerns

## Performance Requirements
- SLAs/SLIs/SLOs
- Expected loads, latency, resource limits
